name: stimband
author: AFNI Developers
description: Determines frequency band covering at least 90% of the 'power' (|FFT|^2) of stimulus columns from X.nocensor.xmat.1D files.

inputs.description: Print the power band for each individual stimulus column from each matrix.
inputs.name: Verbose flag

inputs.description: Another way to read 1 or more matrix files.
inputs.name: Additional matrix files

inputs.description: Set the minimum frequency output for the band. Default value is 0.01.
inputs.name: Minimum Frequency

inputs.description: Set the minimum bandwidth output (top frequency minus bottom frequency). Default is 0.03.
inputs.name: Minimum Bandwidth

inputs.description: Set the minimum power fraction (percentage) to 'ff' instead of the default 90%. Value must be in the range 50..99.
inputs.name: Minimum Power Fraction

output-files.description: The frequency band covering at least 90% of the power of the stimulus columns.
output-files.name: Output frequency band
